tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We visited Deepa mam 2yrs back for the first time in Apollo Hospital. Afterthat we visited her every month for our son's regular health check up & Vaccination...but in this pandemic situation we have started to consult her through practo..& trust me she never disappoints us! So it's been a long time we know Deepa mam.& now she is just like our family dr.Not only she does the best treatment, honestly speaking we never ever seen such a humble & soft spoken person in our life!  So highly recommend her...
                                 With respect:-Adrij's parents

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: My son Atri Pal, 5 years  old, hails from Kolkata and he visits Chennai for his neurological tests every year. That's how I got to visit Dr. Deepa for his paediatric check up. She is extremely kind, patient and even while giving online consultations while we are in our hometown, she is extremely reachable, benevolent. I'm grateful to come across a doctor like her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hi all,
I have consulting doctor deepa mathew 1 year.
She is a super woman!
Same consistent and time spending , listening to the problem
Most important she is always prompt in response when if any emergency comes to picture..
I am happy to get such a doctor.
There was a situation were second wave is on peak and my baby got a fever.
The way she responded tremendous!
Right medicine at right time..
Salute!!!
reply_text: Thank you so much Ms Uma,  for these kind words!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have a twin kid Sachit & Tanvi for both the kids I‚Äôm consulting Deepa Mam for quite a some time. I have seen a quite a few paediatricians before but the care which she takes is utmost. She is quite reachable and friendly  and also is quite surprised to see that she follows up with us post consultation on whether the issue got subsided which I found quite unique and it is a big testimony to her dedication level. * ******** ******* ***** *** ** *** **** ************* ** ********
reply_text: Thank you so much for that lovely review

review:
Well experienced matter.. what a friendly doctor & explained everything very clear.. since we are far from hospital, she asked to contact thru wtsapp in case of need...
Didn‚Äôt write so many medicine(infact no antibiotics)
Highly recommended to all parents...
reply_text: Thank you so much for that great feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Deepa madam is so knowledgeable and she explains all the things in a proper way. She is so caring of kids. Eve though we visited for the first time, we are so comfortable. Thank you madam for your caring treatment.

tags: Wait time,
review: We didn't see the doctor b'coz the doctor went for rounds & the receptionist said that we have to wait. I'm there sharp at 11.30am. so we left without seeing. No meaning in booking an appointment.
reply_text:
Thank you for taking the time to give feedback. On the day in question,  I was called for an emergency  caesarean section and hence I was not available at the time of your appointment. I am sorry that you had to leave without seeing me. But as you can understand,  there are certain  things which are out of  doctor's control like medical emergencies and birth of babies.
Apologies for the delayed  reply to your feedback.
Take care

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: Doctor was so kind and explained our queries. Even provided support after consultation. We are super happy with her approach. I recommend her to any new parents out there
